verses.verse: And he brought me back<WH7725> unto the door<WH6607> of the house<WH1004>; and<WH4325>, behold, waters issued out<WH3318> from under the threshold<WH4670> of the house<WH1004> eastward<WH6921>; (for the forefront<WH6440> of the house<WH1004> was toward the east<WH6921>;) and the waters<WH4325> came down<WH3381> from under<WH3233>, from the right side<WH3802> of the house<WH1004>, on the south<WH5045> of the altar<WH4196>.

Then he brought me out<WH3318> by the way<WH1870> of the gate<WH8179> northward<WH6828>, and led me round by the way<WH1870> without unto the outer<WH2351> gate<WH8179>, by the way<WH1870> of the gate<WH8179> that looketh<WH6437> toward the east<WH6921>; and<WH6379>, behold, there ran out waters<WH4325> on the right<WH3233> side<WH3802>.

When the man<WH376> went forth<WH3318> eastward<WH6921> with the line<WH6957> in his hand<WH3027>, he measured<WH4058> a thousand<WH505> cubits<WH520>, and he caused me to pass through<WH5674> the waters<WH4325>, waters<WH4325> that were to the ankles<WH657>.

Again he measured<WH4058> a thousand<WH505>, and caused me to pass through<WH5674> the waters<WH4325>, waters<WH4325> that were to the knees<WH1290>. Again he measured<WH4058> a thousand<WH505>, and caused me to pass through<WH5674> the waters<WH4325>, waters that were to the loins<WH4975>.

Afterward he measured<WH4058> a thousand<WH505>; and it was a river<WH5158> that I could<WH3201> not pass through<WH5674>; for the waters<WH4325> were risen<WH1342>, waters<WH4325> to swim in<WH7813>, a river<WH5158> that could not be passed through<WH5674>.
And he said<WH559> unto me<WH1121>, Son of man<WH120>, hast thou seen<WH7200> this<WH3212>? Then he brought me<WH7725>, and caused me to return to the bank<WH8193> of the river<WH5158>.
Now when I had returned<WH7725>, behold<WH8193>, upon the bank of the river<WH5158> were very<WH3966> many<WH7227> trees on the one side and on the other<WH6086>.

Then said<WH559> he unto me<WH4325>, These waters issue forth<WH3318> toward the eastern<WH6930> region<WH1552>, and shall go down<WH3381> into the Arabah<WH6160>; and they shall go<WH935> toward the sea<WH3220>; into the sea<WH3220> shall the waters go which were made to issue forth<WH3318>; and the waters<WH4325> shall be healed<WH7495>.

And it shall come to pass<WH5315>, that every living creature which swarmeth<WH2416>, in every place<WH8317> whither the rivers<WH5158> come<WH935>, shall live<WH2421>; and there shall be a very<WH3966> great<WH7227> multitude of fish<WH1710>; for these waters<WH4325> are come<WH935> thither<WH7495>, and the waters of the sea shall be healed, and everything shall live<WH2425> whithersoever the river<WH5158> cometh<WH935>.

And it shall come to pass<WH1728>, that fishers shall stand<WH5975> by it<WH5872>: from En-gedi even unto En-eglaim<WH5882> shall be a place for the spreading<WH4894> of nets<WH2764>; their fish<WH1710> shall be after their kinds<WH4327>, as the fish<WH1710> of the great<WH1419> sea<WH3220>, exceeding<WH3966> many<WH7227>.
But the miry places<WH1207> thereof<WH1360>, and the marshes thereof<WH7495>, shall not be healed; they shall be given<WH5414> up to salt<WH4417>.

And by the river<WH5158> upon the bank<WH8193> thereof<WH5927>, on this side and on that side, shall grow every tree<WH6086> for food<WH3978>, whose leaf<WH5929> shall not whither<WH5034>, neither shall the fruit<WH6529> thereof fail<WH8552>: it shall bring forth new fruit<WH1069> every month<WH2320>, because the waters<WH4325> thereof issue out<WH3318> of the sanctuary<WH4720>; and the fruit<WH6529> thereof shall be for food<WH3978>, and the leaf<WH5929> thereof for healing<WH8644>.

Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136>: This<WH1454> shall be the border<WH1366>, whereby ye shall divide the land<WH776> for inheritance<WH5157> according to the twelve<WH8147> tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478>: Joseph<WH3130> shall have two portions<WH2256>.

And ye shall inherit<WH5157> it<WH376>, one as well as another<WH251>; for I<WH5375> sware<WH3027> to give<WH5414> it unto your fathers<WH1>: and this land<WH776> shall fall<WH5307> unto you for inheritance<WH5159>.

And this shall be the border<WH1366> of the land<WH776>: On the north<WH6828> side<WH6285>, from the great<WH1419> sea<WH3220>, by the way<WH1870> of Hethlon<WH2855>, unto the entrance<WH935> of Zedad<WH6657>;

Hamath <WH2574>, Berothah<WH1268>, Sibraim<WH5453>, which is between the border<WH1366> of Damascus<WH1834> and the border<WH1366> of Hamath<WH2574>; Hazer-hatticon<WH2694>, which is by the border<WH1366> of Hauran<WH2362>.

And the border<WH1366> from the sea<WH3220>, shall be Hazar-enon<WH2703> at the border<WH1366> of Damascus<WH1834>; and on the north<WH6828> northward<WH6828> is the border<WH1366> of Hamath<WH2574>. This is the north<WH6828> side<WH6285>.

And the east<WH6921> side<WH6285>, between<WH996> Hauran<WH2362> and<WH996> Damascus<WH1834> and<WH996> Gilead<WH1568>, and the land<WH776> of Israel<WH3478>, shall be the Jordan<WH3383>; from<WH996> the north border<WH1366> unto the east<WH6931> sea<WH3220> shall ye measure<WH4058>. This is the east<WH6921> side<WH6285>.

And the south<WH5045> side<WH6285> southward<WH8486> shall be from Tamar<WH8559> as far as the waters<WH4325> of Meriboth<WH4808> - kadesh<WH6946>, to the brook<WH5158> of Egypt<WH1419>, unto the great sea<WH3220>. This is the south<WH8486> side<WH6285> southward<WH5045>.

And the west<WH3220> side<WH6285> shall be the great<WH1419> sea<WH3220>, from the south border<WH1366> as far as<WH935> over against<WH5227> the entrance of Hamath<WH2574>. This is the west<WH3220> side<WH6285>.
So shall ye divide<WH2505> this land<WH776> unto you according to the tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478>.

And it shall come to pass<WH5307>, that ye shall divide it by lot for an inheritance<WH5159> unto you and to the strangers<WH1616> that sojourn<WH1481> among<WH8432> you<WH3205>, who shall beget children<WH1121> among<WH8432> you<WH249>; and they shall be unto you as the home - born<WH249> among the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>; they shall have<WH5307> inheritance<WH5159> with you among<WH8432> the tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478>.
And it shall come to pass<WH7626>, that in what tribe the stranger<WH1616> sojourneth<WH1481>, there shall ye give<WH5414> him his inheritance<WH5159>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.
